post.body: I followed her, Cat. :-) Missed you on the show today!
Thanks sweetie!! It is so much fun. BUT...the time seriously flies. It goes so fast trying to keep up with chatroom and show
I'm sorry, Ron!! We broadcast the same time every week. I wish you could join us. I'd love to get you on air. One day...:-)
Thanks, buddy!! I LOVE people...LOVE ActiveRain...LOVE talking...LOVE making people laugh. I'm PERFECT for the job!! LOL
I'm glad you enjoyed it! It is NOT easy to keep up with everyone...but it is FUN!! Rest up for next week. :-)
KEWL!!!
I can't wait for THIS show!! It is going to be the best one yet!
You know it, cutie! Are you brushed up on your ActiveRain trivia??
Thanks buddy!!
@DallasLoanGuy You guys will be really glad to be there. Today's show is extra special!! Be early to get into the chatroom.
Thank you, darling! It will be a really BUSY weekend!! How are you?
Hey woman!! I was just about to leave...but I'm glad I get to say "HOLA" to ya. MWA!!!
Oh...you are such a GOOD FRIEND for doing that!! I owe you one!
Awwwwwwwwww....you can have one of my four to keep you company tonight and tomorrow. :-)
Be careful, girlfriend!!
But I keep threatening to sing it to him. He'd really lose it if I got others in on it.
He's a good guy...but he would seriously wet his pants laughing if everyone sang 'Kumbaya' to him. He's NOT a 'Kumbaya' kinda guy.
I'm going with your definition...approachable, friendly and non-threatening. :-) My husband has a different description...
When I was really little, I used to approach strangers and start up conversations with them. My mom said it freaked them out.
Hello mami! Whatcha doing? Behavin'??
We had TOO much fun!! It was great!! (AS USUAL!)
Hey girlie, missed you today also!
Oh man! That was Diego's favorite toy ever!! BIG HIT! DO IT!!!
Hi back at ya!! Cary is GREAT! How long has it been since you've been here? Say 'HI' any time! :-)
You are TOO sweet!! TY! :-)
Awwwwwww Jon...Thanks!! I LOVE helping Brad out with the show. It is a BLAST! :-) It gets better EVERY week!
Thank YOU! I LOVE IT! I'm off to go show homes now. :-) I better not forget to change out of my party hat!! ~GBU~
Thanks so much for joining the show today!! I really loved knowing you were there!! It was pretty crazy fast in there, huh?? :-)
I'm glad you enjoyed it! I LOVE IT! How are YOU?? We disconnected the other night when we were chatting.
My last post is for you, my friend!! Enjoy...
I'm with YOU! Have a prosperous day!
See ya later, amigo!!
In my dream...I could seriously feel the electricity all over me as we were singing. The whole place was supercharged. TOO COOL!
I think everyday should be a celebration...so I did not miss anything. :-)
I have BIG PLANS for 2009!! :-) Gotta run. See ya soon. BeBlessed!!!
I think you should publish it!! There is something about opening yourself up that makes your life bigger.
Seriously...I even remember part of it. AND...we did this really sweet version of Amazing Grace..totally impromptu. I dream good!
That is so good. I've missed ya, buddy!! I'm just so happy to be back from yuckies. :-)
You are NOT going to believe this...but I dreamed last night that we were writing a song together...kinda impromtu...and singing.
Unfortunately...I was really sick. But, I'm better now! I hope that 2009 is ready for me. ;-) Have a blessed 2009 also!!
That is great! You deserve it. I have been in bed for days...but it was NOT fun. I'd rather be working anytime than be sick.
Thanks!! The holidays were great! I got sick a few days after Christmas. I'm excited about the next RAIN Radio show also. :-)
Thanks buddy!! Happy New Year!!!
Happy New Year to YOU also!! How's the fam?
GREAT!! I finally kicked this nasty virus that attacked me. I feel like I've been in a coma for a week. I was so out of it. YOU??
Be back when I find my missing morning!
I'm getting a cold. I think I sounded like an old man today. LOL
Gonna go call ALL of the people back who called during the show. Have an AWESOME day, guys!!
Thanks to EVERYONE who joined me in the R.A.I.N. Radio chatroom today! You guys ROCKED IT!! See ya next week...same time/same place!!
Join me in the R.A.I.N. Radio chatroom live NOW!! http://tinyurl.com/6onm4w GET YOUR SEAT NOW! We're giving STUFF away today!
Join me in the R.A.I.N. Radio chatroom live in 10minutes!! http://tinyurl.com/6onm4w GET YOUR SEAT NOW! We're giving STUFF away today!
Don't miss R.A.I.N. Radio's live broadcast in 15 mins. It's about FACEBOOK! Read: http://activerain.com/t/830555 for details!
Gotta go take care of some things before the show. Be back in a few.
We'll be giving away ActiveRain prizes!!!! http://tinyurl.com/6onm4w 45 min to show

Just posted on ActiveRain: PRACTICALLY NEW 3 Bedroom PLUS LOFT in Wendell, NC 27591...FOR RENT $1150/Month http://activerain.com/t/834498
Now...I'm off to take this day by storm!
Desperately seeking...craving...remembering...imagining...wishing upon a star...wiggling my nose like that bewitched lady...BUT NO COFFEE!!
Just posted on ActiveRain: Grove Park – Durham, North Carolina 27703 (A Current Market Snapshot) http://activerain.com/t/833902
Okay...boys and girls...time for me to go make dinner for the family. It's baked spaghetti night. YUMMY!! Peace and Love!!!
Okay everyone...let's join hands and sing 'Kumbaya' in honor of my good friend @Bettag...or you can just follow him. LOL
Just posted on ActiveRain: Governors Row -- Featuring Executive Homes by John Wieland in Cary, North Caroli… http://activerain.com/t/845484
I think I'm gonna eat some soup and watch a movie. (and snuggle with hubby!)
<---hears her tummy growling. I guess you're supposed to eat a few times a day...right??
What's UP, buds??? Anyone wanna share a campfire tonight? It's kinda chilly here.
Just posted on ActiveRain: R.A.I.N. Radio VIRTUAL Holiday Bash (Did YOU Hear What Brad Said???) http://activerain.com/t/843626
Can YOU Name ALL FIVE of These Dancing ActiveRain Elves? (A CONTEST & A GIGGLE!!) http://activerain.com/t/841867
Better go tackle a few more of the bullets on my 'MUST DO NOW' list! BBL :-)
IF you missed the show...I'll be posting an 'AFTER PARTY' Reflection post tonight. (with a link to the podcast)
That VIRTUAL PARTY was better than most live holiday parties I've attended. LOL NOT sure what the hidden message is there.
MAN! What a day so far!! Just finished listening to the RAIN Radio show again...made a list of ALL the winners. I feel like Mrs. SANTA!! :-)
THANKS to EVERYONE who participated in the ActiveRain VIRTUAL Holiday Party today on R.A.I.N. Radio!! YOU ROCK!!!
Regardless of the language in which this song is sung...it STILL gives me chills. http://tinyurl.com/6r7snl YOU?
Now...I'm off to catch up on some emails and phone calls. My cell phone is having the DTs!!! ;-)
Thanks to ALL of the great people who followed me while I was away. I'm looking forward to getting to know you in 2009!! ~GBU~
